document.full_text: citigroup inc  has hired samuel di piazza, jr, the former chief executive of pricewaterhousecoopers , to help its faltering investment bank rebuild after the financial crisis.
document.title: citi hires ex-ceo of pricewaterhousecoopers
lines_and_colors: citigroup inc  has hired samuel di piazza, jr, the former chief executive of pricewaterhousecoopers , to help its faltering investment bank rebuild after the financial crisis.
